metadata.title: CVE-2016-8729 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable memory corruption vulnerability exists in the JBIG2 parser of Artifex MuPDF 1.9. A specially crafted PDF can cause a negative number to be passed to a memset resulting in memory corruption and potential code execution. An attacker can specially craft a PDF and send to the victim to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13-4.1').
